hero.intro: Specialist in video, motion graphics and visual storytelling.

about.title: About me
about.intro: I am a passionate audiovisual creator, telling stories through video and animation. My work combines cinematic technique with motion design to create visual pieces that captivate and communicate.
about.experience: With experience in directing, editing and motion graphics, I work on projects ranging from fashion films to interface animations. I specialize in transforming abstract concepts into memorable visual experiences.
about.approach: My approach is collaborative and results-driven. I believe in understanding the client's vision and translating it into audiovisual content that exceeds expectations.

services.title: Video Editing
services.description: Professional editing of audiovisual material for brands, events, and digital content.

services.title: Film Direction
services.description: Direction and production of short films, fashion films and narrative content.

videos.title: Experimental Visual Poetry
videos.description: Experimental audiovisual piece blending light, image, and movement. This video poem explores visual language via kinetic typography, organic textures, and visual metaphors, creating a sensory narrative that transcends the literal. A personal work reflecting my interest in hybrid forms of contemporary audiovisual expression.

videos.title: Fashion Film
videos.description: Cinematic short film focused on fashion. Direction, cinematography, and full editing, exploring visual storytelling through style and contemporary aesthetics.

videos.title: Short Edited Without Script
videos.description: Narrative editing exercise working with existing, unscripted material. Challenge of building a coherent and moving story through montage and shot selection.

videos.title: Short Film Shooting & Editing
videos.description: Editing and camera work for a fiction short film shot on location. I participated in both image capturing and post-production editing in a professional environment. The video shown only features select segments for rights and duration reasons.
